name: HoodTower
description:
Accept the challenge

HoodTower is a game where you take the role of Hood, a little adventurer with one goal in mind, to enter "The Great Tower", a place that is guarded by ancient legends of the past.

Could Hood conquer "The Great Tower", defeat its protectors and claim the title of Legend?

                                    

Improvise and Win

Collect and combine what is within your reach to build powerful weapons that will help you in your quest.

HoodTower invites players to test their makeshifting skills  being under pressure.

We wish you good luck!
